name: Two Of A Kind
description:
"Two Oppositive Sides Forever Together But Never One"

The definition of duality is as old as the mountains' roots and the galaxy's breath. Two opposing sides will always be together, and one will never exist without the other. The player is guided through mazes and Traps in an attempt to combine the two Delicas (Pale and Dark) before time runs out. with offering hope that your other half is always there wherever Pale go Dark will sure to follow.
